summary: Comprehensive testing of all P0-P2 features for Skillax Digital Marketing Academy. All 31 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend features verified: Quiz CTA Banner with 'Take Free Quiz' button, AI Lab CTA with 'Try AI Lab Free' button, AI Marketing Lab with 6 tools (including Lead Magnet Generator and Competitor Analyzer), Course Quiz modal, Admin CMS with login/dashboard/analytics/leads/blogs tabs, Footer hidden admin link (Settings icon), CourseDetail page, SEO meta tags (react-helmet), and visitor tracking.

issues: Twitter card meta tag not found (twitter:card) - minor SEO improvement opportunity

context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0-P2 features verified working: (1) Home page Quiz CTA Banner with 'Take Free Quiz' button - opens Course Quiz modal with 4 questions, (2) Home page AI Lab CTA section with 'Try AI Lab Free' button - opens AI Marketing Lab, (3) AI Marketing Lab shows all 6 tools: AI Ad Copy Generator, AI Blog Outline Creator, AI Lead Magnet Generator, AI Social Media Generator, AI SEO Keyword Analyzer, AI Competitor Analyzer, (4) Admin CMS at /admin with login, Dashboard Overview (Total Leads: 45, Page Views: 35, Conversion Rate: 4.4%, Blog Posts: 9), Analytics tab, Leads tab, Blog Posts tab, Courses tab, Settings tab, (5) Footer has hidden Settings icon linking to /admin, (6) CourseDetail page at /courses/professional-digital-marketing displays correctly with Enroll Now form, (7) SEO meta tags present (title, description, keywords, og:title, og:description, canonical, JSON-LD schema), (8) Visitor tracking working via /api/track/pageview.

quiz_cta_banner.details: Quiz CTA Banner displays on home page with 'Take Free Quiz' button. Button has data-testid='quiz-cta-button'. Clicking opens Course Quiz modal.

ai_lab_cta.details: AI Lab CTA section displays on home page with 'Try AI Lab Free' button. Button has data-testid='ai-lab-cta-button'. Clicking opens AI Marketing Lab modal.

ai_marketing_lab.details: AI Marketing Lab modal shows all 6 tools: (1) AI Ad Copy Generator, (2) AI Blog Outline Creator, (3) AI Lead Magnet Generator (WOW factor), (4) AI Social Media Generator, (5) AI SEO Keyword Analyzer, (6) AI Competitor Analyzer (WOW factor). Powered by GPT-4.

course_quiz_modal.details: Course Quiz modal opens when clicking Quiz CTA. Shows 'Find Your Perfect Course' title, Question 1 of 4, progress bar, and 4 experience level options.

admin_cms.details: Admin CMS at /admin works with login (admin@skillax.in / SkillaxAdmin2024!). Dashboard shows: Total Leads (45), Page Views (35), Conversion Rate (4.4%), Blog Posts (9), Leads by Source chart, Top Pages, Recent Leads. Tabs: Overview, Analytics, Leads, Blog Posts, Courses, Settings.

footer_admin_link.details: Footer has hidden Settings icon (data-testid='footer-admin-link') linking to /admin. Icon is subtle with low opacity styling.

course_detail_page.details: CourseDetail page at /courses/professional-digital-marketing displays correctly with: Course title, 4 Months duration, 8+ Certifications badge, 4.9 Rating, 500+ Students stat, Enroll Now form, What You'll Learn section, 8 Comprehensive Modules.

seo_meta_tags.details: SEO meta tags present via react-helmet-async: title, meta description, meta keywords, og:title, og:description, og:image, canonical URL, JSON-LD schema. Minor: twitter:card not found.

visitor_tracking.details: Visitor tracking working via POST /api/track/pageview. Page views recorded in database and shown in Admin Analytics.

test_files: test_skillax_api.py (17 tests): Health, Admin Auth, Leads, Contact, Courses, Blogs, Chatbot, Analytics
test_admin_cms.py (14 tests): Analytics Summary, Lead Conversion, Leads by Source, Top Pages, Page Views, Visitor Tracking, Leads Management, Blog CRUD
